sources.title: Alice Solves the Puzzle (1925)
sources.description: Alice and Julius are playing on the seashore when Pete comes around, gets Julius drunk and tries to steal a crossword puzzle from Alice. Julius has to sober up  to come to the rescue. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/alice-solves-the-puzzle-1925/

metadata.Plot: Alice, at the beach with her cat, tries to solve a crossword puzzle, when Woodleg Pete, a ruthless collector of rare crossword puzzles, sees that Alice's one is missing in his collection. But while trying to steal it, he did not include Alice's cat in his calculation...
